name: Cheap Shot 0.1a
description:
Cheap Shot

This is a demo project made for the Zodiac Marathon - Taurus Split.
I planned of implementing a lot more features and depths arisen from playtesting with real cards so I might publish something along this lines in the future with more content.

How to Play
You only need the arrow keys to play:
Left and Right to move
Up and Down to select a card or return it to the hand.
When a card is selected pressing Up again will play it.

The objective of the game is winning 4 tricks, each turn the lead player will play a card and the opponent will have the opportunity to play a higher one to win, a lower one to lose or the same card to draw.
The winning player in a trick leads the next one (or the same player in case of a draw)
The joker is 0!
The first card is played simultaneously and hidden and it's just to establish who will lead first.
